events.message: I received my order last week but the product is not what I expected and I want to request a refund. Please assist me with the return process.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back and return process.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request submitted by the customer regarding their recent order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you would like to request a refund. I am here to help you through the return process.
Could you please provide your order number and details about the product you wish to return so we can process your refund efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the product is a blue wireless speaker that did not meet my expectations.
Thank you for the information. We have initiated your refund request and you will receive a return shipping label via email shortly.
I appreciate your quick response and look forward to receiving the shipping label to return the product as soon as possible.
Your refund request is now fully processed. Once we receive the returned item, the refund will be completed within 5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Thank you for contacting support. We are closing this case now. Please feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance.
